title: I'm a Self-Proclaimed Bikini Expert—Here Are My 28 Picks for Spring Break
text: Growing up on a lake meant living in a bikini from sunrise to sunset all summer long. That kind of upbringing turns you into a swimwear expert by default—or at least, that's what my friends and family would say. As the go-to bikini guru in my circle, I've made it my mission to find the best, most flattering, and on-trend bikinis ahead of every warm-weather season or trip. Because at the end of the day, my happiest place is by the water, and looking good while I'm there is just part of the fun.Keep scrolling for my top picks for your next getaway, whether it's a spring break trip somewhere tropical or a weekend stay on the coast. Staud Jo Balconette Bikini Top Julliet Swimwear Ingrid Balconette Bikini Top Frankies Bikinis Cola Gingham Underwire Bikini Top in Blackberry Gingham The combination of gingham and a balconette-style top is the ultimate girly perfection. Shop the matching Dove Gingham Bikini Bottom ($95). Zimmermann Everley Metallic Mini Bikini Triangle Bikini Set Playful but polished, thanks to that subtle metallic sheen. With Jéan Jeanie Bikini Top in Pink Stripe Pucci Printed Triangle Bikini Top If there’s one thing I’ll never say no to, it’s a Pucci print. Shop the matching Printed Bikini Bottom ($205). Cala de la Cruz Isla Scooped Bikini Top Missoni Shimmer Knit String Bikini Nothing says chic getaway like a Missoni bikini. Reilly The Label Reilly the Label, Nantucket Top The little heart embellishments are too good.Shop the matching Nantucket Bottom ($72). Tropic of C Equator Bikini Top Candice Swanepoel just gets it. Sustainable, cute, and on-trend.Shop the matching Praia Bikini Bottom ($90). Ziah Fine Strap Wire Balconette Top If you favor bright colors, this bold red suit is for you. Shop the matching Classic Bikini Bottom ($121). Same Los Angeles Marble Top This shimmer and a tan? Sign me up.Shop the matching Lee Bottom ($85). Johanna Ortiz Marina Bikini Top Patbo Jersey Sands Metallic Stone Bikini Top Christopher Esber Ruched Prong Bikini Bandeau Superdown Lucy Bikini Top Stay ahead of one of summer's biggest print trends.Shop the matching Lucy Bikini Bottom ($46). Lido Venti Printed Triangle Bikini For when you want to wear your negroni. Same Los Angeles Knotted Bandeau Top Because a chic brown bikini belongs in everyone's lineup. Shop the matching '90s Bottom ($95). Hunza G Gloria Ring-Detail Strapless Bikini Oséree Lumière Ring Bikini Bring the party to the poolside! Rat & Boa Ribiero Bikini Top This bright and psychedelic print is perfect for a tropical getaway.Shop the matching Ribeiro Bikini Bottom ($125). Solid & Striped Daphne Luxe Ribbed Bikini Top Noir Same Los Angeles Rosette Bandeau Top Still very much in my rosette era.Shop the matching Bikini Bottom ($140). Frankies Bikinis x Bella Hadid Paradise Halter Bikini Top in Sunkissed Suede Gnash Towelling Teardrop Crop Bikini Top Explore More: Bikini Beach
html:
Growing up on a lake meant living in a bikini from sunrise to sunset all summer long. That kind of upbringing turns you into a swimwear expert by default—or at least, that's what my friends and family would say. As the go-to bikini guru in my circle, I've made it my mission to find the best, most flattering, and on-trend bikinis ahead of every warm-weather season or trip. Because at the end of the day, my happiest place is by the water, and looking good while I'm there is just part of the fun.

Keep scrolling for my top picks for your next getaway, whether it's a spring break trip somewhere tropical or a weekend stay on the coast.

Staud

Jo Balconette Bikini Top

Julliet Swimwear

Ingrid Balconette Bikini Top

Frankies Bikinis

Cola Gingham Underwire Bikini Top in Blackberry Gingham

The combination of gingham and a balconette-style top is the ultimate girly perfection.

Shop the matching Dove Gingham Bikini Bottom ($95).

Zimmermann

Everley Metallic Mini Bikini Triangle Bikini Set

Playful but polished, thanks to that subtle metallic sheen.

With Jéan

Jeanie Bikini Top in Pink Stripe

Pucci

Printed Triangle Bikini Top

If there’s one thing I’ll never say no to, it’s a Pucci print.

Shop the matching Printed Bikini Bottom ($205).

Cala de la Cruz

Isla Scooped Bikini Top

Missoni

Shimmer Knit String Bikini

Nothing says chic getaway like a Missoni bikini.

Reilly The Label

Reilly the Label, Nantucket Top

The little heart embellishments are too good.

Shop the matching Nantucket Bottom ($72).

Tropic of C

Equator Bikini Top

Candice Swanepoel just gets it. Sustainable, cute, and on-trend.

Shop the matching Praia Bikini Bottom ($90).

Ziah

Fine Strap Wire Balconette Top

If you favor bright colors, this bold red suit is for you.

Shop the matching Classic Bikini Bottom ($121).

Same Los Angeles

Marble Top

This shimmer and a tan? Sign me up.

Shop the matching Lee Bottom ($85).

Johanna Ortiz

Marina Bikini Top

Patbo

Jersey Sands Metallic Stone Bikini Top

Christopher Esber

Ruched Prong Bikini Bandeau

Superdown

Lucy Bikini Top

Stay ahead of one of summer's biggest print trends.

Shop the matching Lucy Bikini Bottom ($46).

Lido

Venti Printed Triangle Bikini

For when you want to wear your negroni.

Same Los Angeles

Knotted Bandeau Top

Because a chic brown bikini belongs in everyone's lineup.

Shop the matching '90s Bottom ($95).

Hunza G

Gloria Ring-Detail Strapless Bikini

Oséree

Lumière Ring Bikini

Bring the party to the poolside!

Rat & Boa

Ribiero Bikini Top

This bright and psychedelic print is perfect for a tropical getaway.

Shop the matching Ribeiro Bikini Bottom ($125).

Solid & Striped

Daphne Luxe Ribbed Bikini Top Noir

Same Los Angeles

Rosette Bandeau Top

Still very much in my rosette era.

Shop the matching Bikini Bottom ($140).
